programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: The big blue is the world's greatest wilderness. It is a marine desert far from shore and many kilometers deep with nothing to eat and nowhere to hide.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: In our green seas, competition is fierce. Sunlight powers vast kelp forests, mangroves, prairies of seagrass and blooms of algae. Here, animals must fight for space and food. In kelp forests, a common octopus must become the ultimate escape artist.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: At the coast, two worlds collide. Coasts is the story of how our wildlife survives in this ever-changing world. It's a roller-coaster ride of heart-stopping action and epic drama, with characters from beautiful to bizarre.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: A journey from the intense heat of the tropics to the planet's frozen poles. Life has spread to almost every part of the ocean, but there are many different worlds within it, and each presents unique challenges.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Visit the unknown to discover an unimaginable abundance of life in the pitch-black darkness of the seabed. Antarctica is the coldest, harshest and most remote continent on earth.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Corals build themselves homes of limestone in the warm, clear, shallow seas of the tropics. Their reefs occupy less than one tenth of one per cent of the ocean floor, yet they are home to a quarter of all known marine species.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: The big blue is the world's greatest wilderness. It is a marine desert far from shore and many kilometers deep with nothing to eat and nowhere to hide.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: In our green seas, competition is fierce. Sunlight powers vast kelp forests, mangroves, prairies of seagrass and blooms of algae. Here, animals must fight for space and food. In kelp forests, a common octopus must become the ultimate escape artist.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: At the coast, two worlds collide. Coasts is the story of how our wildlife survives in this ever-changing world. It's a roller-coaster ride of heart-stopping action and epic drama, with characters from beautiful to bizarre.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Explore parts of the ocean that have never been visited, encounter extraordinary animals and discover insights into life beneath the waves. Sir David Attenborough then examines the impact of human activity.

programme.title: Hidden Habitats
programme.desc: Steve Backshall reveals the incredible influence that insects and their close relatives have on our planet's many ecosystems. In South America, the landscape has been created almost solely by one team of insects: grass-cutter ants.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Trapped in a world unlike any other he has seen, the Doctor faces the greatest challenge of his many lives. Pursued by the fearsome creature known only as the Veil, he must attempt the impossible.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A Time Lord known as the Doctor uses the TARDIS to aid others throughout time and space.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Madame de Pompadour's dreams are being haunted by a stranger called the Doctor. When she finds the court of Versailles under attack from clockwork droids she tries to summon her mysterious Doctor to save the day.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A young woman finds cryptic messages from 1969 coming from a stranger called the Doctor when people start disappearing.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A brand-new Doctor crashes to Earth with no time to ponder his new face and personality - he must save humanity from an alien threat. The Doctor also meets his new companion, Amy Pond, and she's been waiting for him a very long time.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Amy finds herself battling a deadly alien in France with none other than Vincent Van Gogh.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Ko Sho Blo! Trigger-happy space police the Judoonare targeting 21st century Gloucester. The Doctor, Yaz, Ryan and Graham race back to Earth in order to prevent them doing too much damage to the cathedral city.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: With the Doctor locked away in an alien prison, Yaz, Ryan and Graham are on Earth having to carry on with their lives without her. However, they soon discover a disturbing plan forming involving a Dalek. How can you fight a Dalek without the Doctor.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In 2013, something terrible is awakening in London's National Gallery. In 1562, a murderous plot is afoot in Elizabethan England. Meanwhile, somewhere in space an ancient battle reaches its devastating conclusion.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: This animated version of the 1968 classic sees the TARDIS land on the sea's surface off the Dover coast. They are trespassing in a restricted area of a gas refinery and are tranquilized. The refinery has other problems though.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: Buddy Hall and Steve Finch are two feuding neighbours, who try to prove to the other that they have more Holiday spirit by overly decorating their houses.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: A woman who works as an elf at a year-round Christmas store meets a man and finds her life changing.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: When three friends realize that quitting their jobs isn't an option they conspire to murder their bosses.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
programme.desc: Arthur's father, the King, was murdered when he was a young boy. Though he managed to escape, Arthur grew up in the back alleys of the city. However, once he pulls a mystical sword from a stone, his life is turned upside down as his legacy appears.

programme.title: Chocolat
programme.desc: A mother and daughter open a chocolate shop in a small conservative French village.

programme.title: Jane Eyre
programme.desc: After winning the heart of her employer, a governess discovers he is hiding a terrible secret.

programme.title: Anna to the Infinite Power
programme.desc: A girl discovers she is the result of a cloning experiment, and tries to find her clones.

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: A grieving couple agrees to have a doctor clone their recently deceased eight year-old son. Everything seems fine until their new son reaches the age at which he previously died, and strange things begin to occur.

programme.title: Sophie's Choice
programme.desc: Haunted by her past, a survivor of a Nazi concentration camp struggles to find happiness.

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: An engineer creates a weapon to battle aliens, only to be suspected as an alien himself.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: When a man tries to expose a dark secret about a deceased patriarch, chaos ensues.

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: Three adults must track down the werewolf that bit them in order to reverse their fate.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: Following a terrorist attack on an American compound, a team of FBI agents travel to Saudi Arabia in hopes of uncovering and disabling a terrorist network. As the situation escalates, the agents grow increasingly frustrated with Saudi interference.

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: While on a mission to learn what happened to her mother, a woman performs unauthorized in exorcisms.

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: A man with psychic powers protects a young girl with similar abilities from a cult.

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: An astronaut returns to earth after an impactful mission, and struggles to reintegrate.

programme.title: Lovelace
programme.desc: Documenting the abusive relationship between Linda Lovelace and her husband during the production of a 1970s adult film.

programme.title: Within
programme.desc: A widower moves into a seemingly perfect new home with his daughter and his new wife.

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: Three adults must track down the werewolf that bit them in order to reverse their fate.

programme.title: Ghost in the Machine
programme.desc: A murderer continues his killing spree when lightning enables his soul to travel through electrical wires.

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: Two families' histories collide when their children begin to date. After the young couple gets into a horrific accident, their conflicts reach a boiling point.

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: An eccentric, childless couple decide to kidnap one baby from a set of quintuplets.

programme.title: An Ideal Husband
programme.desc: A husband's seemingly perfect life is threatened by evidence of a past misdeed.

programme.title: Muriel's Wedding
programme.desc: A socially inept young woman with a dysfunctional family yearns for a better life.

programme.title: Idlewild
programme.desc: Two Prohibition-era club owners and performers fend off a vicious gangster determined to cut himself into a share of their profitable speakeasy.

programme.title: Stuber
programme.desc: An aggressive police officer forcefully recruits his uber driver to help with his work.

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: Twenty years after a boy died while performing in a school play, a group of friends breaks into the school at night to sabotage the set of the resurrected version of the production. Strange occurrences quickly go from eerie to terrifying.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: In Thailand, a group of Christian aid workers recruit John Rambo to guide them up the Salween River to deliver medical supplies to the Karen tribe of neighbouring Burma (aka Myanmar).

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: A special agent becomes a vigilante after a ruthless assassin murders all of his loved ones during a family reunion.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A widowed mother and her two daughters add a new stunt to their séance scam, a spirit board. When the youngest finds the board, she contacts a spirit and is possessed. Confronting their fears, the small family risks everything to save themselves.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Two CIA agents wage war against each other when they find out they have been dating the same woman.

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: A group of Sudanese refugees arrive in America to start a new life. They're met at the airport by an employment agency counselor who winds up helping them navigate the 20th century and rebuild their lives.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Twelve strangers wake up, bounded, in the middle of a secluded clearing. Before they're able to wonder how they got there, guns ring and they are forced to find their way through the most sadistic game of all.

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A brilliant convicted hacker is released from prison to help American and Chinese authorities track down a mysterious cybercriminal.

programme.title: Proof of Life
programme.desc: A woman hires a professional negotiator when guerrillas in South America kidnap her husband.

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: An outlaw finds his life becoming all the more dangerous when he turns against a gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: A special agent becomes a vigilante after a ruthless assassin murders all of his loved ones during a family reunion.

programme.title: Gamer
programme.desc: An online game gives humans to ability to control the lives and actions of other humans. A top player from the game tries to gain back his freedom from other players by killing the creator of the game.

programme.title: The Good Liar
programme.desc: A conman targets a wealthy widow, but his scam turns into a game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: After falling through the ice on a frozen lake, a boy is without a pulse for nearly 45 minutes, but with the help of doctors he makes a miraculous recovery that strengthens his and his family's faith.

programme.title: El Norte
programme.desc: Two siblings travel from Guatemala to the U.S. after their village is massacred.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: An astronaut departs on a mission to discover what happened to a previous expedition that included his father.

programme.title: Project X
programme.desc: Three high school seniors throw a birthday party to make a name for themselves. As the night progresses, things spiral out of control as word of the party spreads.

programme.desc: Newly appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill's position is threatened by political opponents led by a former Prime Minister who desire appeasement with Nazi Germany when Britain's army becomes surrounded and trapped on a beach in France.
